SEARCH

Package passwordmanager.encoder

package passwordmanager.encoder
A package with tools for data encryption/decryption
Since:
2023-12-15
See Also:
  • IEncoder
  • DefaultEncoder
  • ThreadEncoder
  • Class
    Description
    DefaultEncoder
    A standard encoder implementation that allows you to encrypt and decrypt both text data and data structures
    IEncoder
    An encoder that allows you to encrypt and decrypt both text data and data structures
    IEncoder.EncoderAlgorithm
    Algorithms that can be used IEncoder.EncoderAlgorithm.MD2 IEncoder.EncoderAlgorithm.MD5 IEncoder.EncoderAlgorithm.SHA IEncoder.EncoderAlgorithm.SHA256 IEncoder.EncoderAlgorithm.SHA384 IEncoder.EncoderAlgorithm.SHA512
    ThreadEncoder
    Encoder implementation that allows you to encrypt and decrypt both text data and data structures, with multi-threading support
